name: Birdlife
description:
Here's the poster!

Jackson Coll - Lead Design

Brandon McCrae - Animator/Modeller

Justin Vincent - Audio Engineer (Music)

Michael Pearse - Audio Engineer (Sound effects)

If you'd like to get in contact with any of these people to help work on one of your projects, contact me at Jacksoncoll@live.com and I will help get them in contact with you.

Thanks for playing!
